name: Speed Boots
description: A pair of boots that enhance the wearer's speed.
looks: These boots are made of sleek black leather and have silver accents. They have a futuristic design.

name: Swift Boots
description: A pair of boots that enhance the wearer's speed and agility.
looks: The boots are made of supple leather, with intricate stitching and silver accents.

special_effects.Increased Dodge Chance: Grants the wearer a higher chance to dodge incoming attacks.

name: Elixir of Endurance
description: An elixir that enhances stamina and physical endurance for a short period of time.
looks: A small, golden vial containing a glowing orange liquid.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made of pure silver.
looks: The sword has a gleaming silver blade with an intricate hilt adorned with engravings.

name: Quick Healing Potion
description: A potion that quickly restores a large amount of health.
looks: A small glass vial filled with a sparkling golden liquid.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: A magical cloak that grants the wearer the ability to become invisible.
looks: The cloak is made of a shimmering fabric that seems to blend seamlessly with the surroundings.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants the wearer the ability to become invisible for a short duration.

name: Luck Elixir
description: An elixir that imbues the drinker with good luck for a period of time.
looks: The elixir is a small vial filled with a sparkling golden liquid.

name: Health Restoration Potion
description: A potion that restores a small amount of health.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a glowing blue liquid.

name: Explosive Bomb
description: A bomb that explodes upon impact, dealing damage to enemies in the area.
looks: The bomb is round and metallic, with a fuse at the top.

special_effects.Explosive: Explodes upon impact, dealing damage to enemies in the area.

name: Antidote
description: A potion that can cure poison.
looks: The antidote is a small glass vial filled with a clear liquid.

name: Scroll of Fireball
description: A scroll that contains the spell Fireball.
looks: The scroll is made of old parchment with arcane symbols inscribed on it.

special_effects.explosion: Creates a fiery explosion on impact, damaging all nearby enemies.

name: Firebolt Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the Firebolt spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment, with ancient runes inscribed upon it.

special_effects.ignite: Sets targets on fire, dealing additional fire damage over time.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that allows the user to cast a fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of ancient parchment and has intricate fire runes inscribed on it.

special_effects.ignite: The fireball has a chance to ignite the target, causing additional damage over time.

name: Lightning Bolt Scroll
description: A scroll imbued with the power of lightning, casting this scroll unleashes a powerful bolt of lightning.
looks: The scroll is made of ancient parchment with intricate lightning patterns drawn on it.

special_weapon_skils.scroll_magic: Unleashes the power of magic spells.

special_effects.shock: Chance to stun enemies upon casting.

name: Medicinal Herb
description: A herb with healing properties that can be used to restore health.
looks: The herb is a small plant with green leaves and a strong aroma.
